attributes.action: Make st Georges Day a National Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales, Scotland, England and Northern Ireland have the least number of bank holidays in Europe. The national days of these countries are ideal opportunities to increase the number of days and at the same time allow us to celebrate our individual culture, languages and identities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
